title: Course for Strengthening Problem-Solving Competencies Based on Cognitive Load Classification and Brain Activity Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative workers requiring advanced learning on cognitive load management and scientific analysis methods in complex work environments. Practical components are structured in smartphone-centered limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Through problem-solving tasks, learners can classify high/medium/low cognitive load states with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the correlation between cognitive load and neural responses using fNIRS-based brain activity data.
Learners understand the fundamental principles of the LSTM-BAM hybrid model and can explain how to apply it to time-series data analysis.
Learners can design cognitive load measurement experiments using smartphone-based tools in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
